snippet: A visit to the New York perch of William Sanford Nye, a.k.a. Bill Nye the Science Guy.
abstract: William Sanford Nye, known to many as Bill Nye the Science Guy, loves his one-bedroom rental apartment in Manhattan's Chelsea neighborhood for excellent location; he has filled the soundproofed space with rental furniture, along with a few treasured personal possessions.
lead_paragraph: A visit to the New York perch of William Sanford Nye, a.k.a. Bill Nye the Science Guy.

headline.print_headline: Where the Science Guy Loosens His Tie
headline.main: Where the Science Guy Loosens His Tie
